name: Hell Hero 2
description:
Choose between dozens of heroes, unlock new ones and solve quests a new long mission has been assigned to our hero. simple mouse clicks will show him the way for the steps, the direction his weapon should follow and even what loot to collect to become as rich as the heroes of past times. find new equipment, refuse no quest in order to reveal every secret of the chambers and kill lots of monsters. the character's own interests depend on his performance!
Slash your way through demons and fulfill your duty of destroying the rebel lords of hell in the new loot heroes game! wander around labyrinths, find your enemies, kill them, get loot and you will be rewarded with unlocked characters and powers. you have a special skill for each character you choose, so make sure you use it and you will become a hero.
